Title: plasmatrim.net
Description: A library for controlling the USB PlasmaTrim from a .net application.
HomeWiki:
PlasmaTrim.net


PlasmaTrim.net is a managed, entirely C#-based library for controlling a USB PlasmaTrim. The USB PlasmaTrim is an 8-LED, individually addressable light bar produced by ChromaCove.

PlasmaTrim.net completely abstracts away all the mess of dealing with the USB HID protocol, allowing you to program patterns and control the device in real-time using native .net types like System.Drawing.Color. It handles all the heavy lifting in the background for you!
